reviews.title: Fantastic location & Modern clean room
reviews.text: The location of this hotel is perfect for checking out downtown or heading to the suburbs. Walk down George St or take the bus or nearby is central station to take the train anywhere. The rail system is great. Also within an easy walk is paddys market, Sydney Entertainment Centre. The hotel staff were friendly and efficient. We were able to check in early and they held our bags for us until we needed them the day we left. The room was modern, of good size, nicely furnished and clean. I would definately recommend this hotel and we will stay again here when next in Sydney

What a great place to put you head down after a hectic day of sightseeing in Sydney. On arrival I was shown to my room a suite no doubt. It had a kingsize bed with separate shower, separate kitchen with everything that one needs for a couple of nights stay. The separate lounge dining room with the air conditioner was a bonus. I will definitely stay there again,
reviews.title: fantastic hotel so central

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I were originally allocated Room 301. To our dismay, there are no windows in the room; luckily managed to change to Room 611 facing George Street therefore slightly noisy. Comfortable bed and clean. Walking distance to China Town and monorail to Darling Harbour. Good value for money.
reviews.title: Near China Town / Slightly Noisy

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed at the re-named Marque Hotel now known as Rendezvous Studio Sydney Central from 10 to 15 Feb 2013.
reviews.title: CENTRAL LOCATION
Great Rooftop Pool
reviews.text: The Hotel has a good location, very near to the train station (central station), nice walking distance to Darling Harbour, Harbour Side. There are cafes easily within reach around the Hotel.

reviews.title: Good Value, Good Service
reviews.text: Firstly, this hotel is now the Rendezvous as mentioned in previous reviews, spent 3 nights and found the amenities to be of a good standard. The room is a little small, but it is neat and modern. We had opted to use the hotel restaurant to catch up with about 10 friends on our first night - the food was good but not spectacular, however the service was good and prices were reasonable.

The staff were friendly and resolved quickly a dispute that we had about our bill when it came time to check out. A very handy location so close to central station, paddys markets and chinatown. Really easy to catch a cab (from hotel to Darling Harbour was $10 each way). Would stay there again.
reviews.title: Great location in Sydney CBD

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Booked 2 rooms for 5 of us. The reception was professional , very helpful and welcoming at check in. They were ready with my bookings and requests and allowed us an early check in.
reviews.title: Good hotel if you can find it

reviews.text: The room was clean and spacious for the price and also quiet even though in cbd, and opp central station. It is 700m to Sydney paddy’s market and China town. It’s also walkable to Darling harbour about 1.5km away.
reviews.title: Central station

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Allowed a complimentary 1 hour late check till 11am and there is a small luggage room to keep baggage as we wanted to leave at 12.30pm. Would definitely stay here again in Sydney if the price is right.
reviews.title: Marque? now Rendezvous? Sydney

reviews.text: This is undoubtedly in an excellent spot. Can be a little noisy, even on top floor.
reviews.title: Excellent location
Really Great
reviews.text: The carpets in a few places need replaced. Noticed a leak in ceiling when it rained.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Handy Location,clean & modern

reviews.text: One night stay at Rendezvous was greeted with a free upgrade of room, always nice! Modern fit out, nice decor. All staff encountered were super friendly and helfpful. The location is fantastic for my business needs, close to train station and uni. Would definately stay here again.
reviews.title: Good Location BUT the rooms need some TLC

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just returned from a 3 night stay at the Rendezvous Studio Hotel (formerly called The Marque) So easy to catch the train from the airport to Central Railway Station ($15.90 one way ) and simply walk across the road ....no lugging bags around the busy city precinct! Room had a window overlooking the main road & railway station & we thought initally it would be noisy, but it wasn't, we were on the 9th floor however.
reviews.title: Rendezvous getaway

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall, the hotel is great value for money. Rooms are a good size and decor. If you want to regularly get to The Rocks area, then it's a 30 minute walk, however, the hotel is opposite Central Station from which you can get trams and buses which run regularly.
reviews.title: Good value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My feedback to the hotel would be that the hotel room doors should have spy holes and that rooms should have safety deposit boxes.
reviews.title: Good value for location and comfortable
Now Rendezvous Studios
reviews.text: Spent 2 nights here in January and was very happy overall with the hotel facities and room. Restaurant/room service was reasonably priced also for Sydney. It's located on george street accross from the train station. Overall no complaints with the hotel, staff were very nice, check out time is 10 which is a little early but staff will hold your luggage until you re ready to leave. No problem recommending this hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As previous reporters we had to ask in another hotel before we found this one. We had walked right past it once, laden down with our luggage.
reviews.title: now called Rendevouz studio !
